info.title: IdeaSoft Case API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for IdeaSoft Case Study

get.description: Get a list of all categories

post.description: Create a new category with the provided data

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific category including its products
Get a list of all discounts

post.description: Create a new discount with the provided data

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific discount
Calculate applicable discounts for a specific order

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of order to calculate discounts for

get.description: Get a list of orders for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new order with the provided items

message.example: Insufficient stock for one or more products

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific order

put.description: Update the status of an existing order

get.description: Get a list of all products

post.description: Create a new product with the provided data

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific product including its category
Get a list of products in a specific category

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: ID of category to get products from
